member.name: M:Reservation.API.Controllers.ReservationsController.Get
member.summary: Provide a list of all reservations. ReservationModel must have a Date and client name.

member.name: M:Reservation.API.Controllers.ReservationsController.Post(Reservation.API.Models.ReservationModel)
member.summary: Try to create a new reservationModel. Input DTO must have the Date and client name.
